definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Ministry of Land and Resources (MLR), formed in 1998
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground

sentences.english: They weeded the mounds and piled fresh dirt atop.
sentences.chinese: 他们铲除坟上的杂草，再将在坟顶堆上新鲜的土。

sentences.english: Analysis is made on wave propagation in soils under high speed train loads by two-dimensional finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 基于有限元法分析了地铁运行引起的土的波动特性。

sentences.english: A long stick should be knocked into the earth.
sentences.chinese: 一根长棍子应该被敲进土里。

sentences.english: Microporous Si-Ti pillared montmorillonite materials were prepared in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一种硅钛柱撑蒙脱土微孔材料。

sentences.english: They placed dirt and rocks in a pan and then filled it about half way with water.
sentences.chinese: 他们在平底锅安置了土和岩石然后填装了一半。

sentences.english: In addition, the CONSOLID stabilized soil can also have the use of recycled.
sentences.chinese: 此外，抗疏力固化土还具有可循环再生使用性。

sentences.english: He was told not to tread the earth round the roots of the seedling.
sentences.chinese: 他被吩咐不可把树苗根部周围的土踩硬。

sentences.english: They first came to Atlantic Canada to fish and trade with Aboriginal peoples.
sentences.chinese: 他们最先来到“大西洋加拿大“捕鱼及与土箸通商。

sentences.english: The pigs rooted for truffle in this forest.
sentences.chinese: 猪在森林里用嘴拱土寻找块菌。

sentences.english: All creatures in this world grow from the earth and eventually die in the earth.
sentences.chinese: 这世上所有的生物都是生于土，死于土。

sentences.english: All creatures in this world grow from the earth and eventually die in the earth.
sentences.chinese: 这世上所有的生物都是生于土，死于土。

sentences.english: The ointment of montmorillonite oxide fit the nation standard and is safety to human.
sentences.chinese: 纳米蒙脱土软膏是一种符合国家安全标准的新产品。

sentences.english: The study also identified another coyote migration route moving through the southern states.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究还确定了土狼向南部诸州迁移的另一条路径。

sentences.english: Suitable content of gypsum will be helpful to improve the strength of the soft soil solidified by the cement.
sentences.chinese: 适量的石膏掺入也有利于窑灰水泥固化土强度的提高。

sentences.english: We had to fill up each mu of terraced fields with thousands of basketfuls of good soil.
sentences.chinese: 每亩梯田我们得填上成千上万筐好土。

sentences.english: Soil, but the former residence. Prometheans million.

definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
water and soil/surface water/natural environment (extended meaning)/climate
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
loess (yellow sandy soil typical of north China)
age/seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/seventh in order/letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 255°/hepta
11th earthly branch: 7-9 p.m., 9th solar month (8th October-6th November), year of the Dog/ancient Chinese compass point: 300°
see 屈戌兒|屈戌儿[qu1 qu5 er5]
